text: Preventive health care is key! 🔑 PGIMER specialists are taking the initiative to educate the public on disease prevention and timely medical care. 💡🏥 This will not only improve health outcomes but also reduce financial burdens. 💰📉 Kudos to PGI director Prof Vivek Lal for emphasizing the importance of this educational outreach! 🙌 Let's work together for a healthier community! 🤝
